Repository Name Unauthorized: Sisters of Charity of the Incarnate Word Archives
Notes: The Congregational Archives preserves documents, photographs, and artifacts dating from our origins in San Antonio from 1869 to the present. Our records include administrative, personnel, and ministry files from the United States, Mexico, Peru, and Zambia. Records relating to the Sisters' ministry activity (in schools, hospitals, and social services) within the primarily Mexican American communities in early and present-day San Antonio area are well-represented.
